name: .LRDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .LRDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created by Adobe Lightroom version 1, the first installment of the photo management application; stores information about a collection of images that have been imported into the software; enables storage of organized photo data.

content: Later versions of Lightroom use .LRCAT files for photo catalog information.
NOTE: Lightroom was formerly known as Photoshop Lightroom.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
